pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Utilities for Year Month Day Objects // A collection of utility functions for working with Year Month Day objects. Includes functions for fast parsing of numeric and character input based on algorithms described in Hinnant, H. (2021) https://howardhinnant.github.io/date_algorithms.html as well as a branchless calculation of leap years by Jerichaux (2025) https://stackoverflow.com/a/79564914.
